attraction_reviewComments: Nothing better than leaving the busy city, smog, and noise to enjoy a day of peace and beauty. Amazing scenery and shows the true power of mother nature.
Day hike out of Edison to Devils Bathtub. Long hike long day lol. It is gorgeous hiking and and the trails are well kept. The forest service has done their job well!
mention_address: "Sierra National Forest, Whisky Snowmobile Trails Road, Cascadel Woods, Madera County, California, United States of America"
